::DrillBit::

"Has anyone or anything been infected with this virus yet? And the ones
out side are foolish. If he doesn't give us the vacine, then we will
kill his people. And even if we didn't, and he didn't give it to us, his
people would die at the hands of their own vacine. Some bots should
really think things through, jeesh. Anyway, where are SilverScout and
the other intruders? Or dont we know that?" He finaly finished all his
questions and quotes that seemed more like one long speach, then a few
questions.
"I would like to see these intruders."
